Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Amends the "COVID-19 Emergency Eviction and Foreclosure Prevention Act of 2020" to expire on June 30, 2021
Summary: Amends the "COVID-19 Emergency Eviction and Foreclosure Prevention Act of 2020" to expire on June 30, 2021.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 381 of the laws of 2020 establishing the "COVID-19 Emergency Eviction and Foreclosure Prevention Act of 2020", in relation to the effectiveness of such chapter
